thread.title: James Corden Gave A Heartfelt Tribute To George Michael
thread.title_full: James Corden Gave A Heartfelt Tribute To George Michael

author: Ali Velez
title: James Corden Gave A Heartfelt Tribute To George Michael
text:
View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com ID: 10266950 3. He remembered lonely times, when George’s music meant so much. View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com ID: 10266957 View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com ID: 10266963 5. James talked about the fateful phone call from George that wound up being the beginning of what would eventually become Carpool Karaoke. View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com The two teamed up in 2011 to do a sketch for Comic Relief, a popular British charity telethon, and that sketch turned out to be the first ever Carpool Karaoke.
ID: 10266969 6. That moment years ago has clearly made a huge impact on James, and his current career. View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com And we’re all thankful for it.
ID: 10267004 7. Watch the entire video for James’ touching tribute and to see the full 2011 sketch, because it is all just so delightful. View this image ›
CBS / Via youtube.com ID: 10267016
